1.rationale:
Thinking out loud...

I'm at position (9, 7) and there's an apple at (7, 7) which is two spaces to my left. There's also an enemy snake at (7, 8) which is above the apple. I don't want to go up and risk running into the enemy snake. I also don't want to go down because there's no apple in that direction and I might get trapped.

My best option is to go left towards the apple at (7, 7). I'll try to get to the apple before the enemy snake does.

Strategy for next turn: Keep an eye on the enemy snake and be prepared to change direction if it moves towards me.

Next move: LEFT.

2.rationale:
Strategy: Move towards the nearest apple while avoiding collisions with walls or other snakes.
Next move: RIGHT
